name: B7 - Clothes Sorting Simulator 2015
description:
This game has been created while participating in the Indie Gameleon Game Jam 2015 at HAW Hamburg.

Collect volunteers entering the hall to help sort free clothes for a charity event. You win if you process all packages. You will lose if too many volunteers get bored and leave the event.

Controls:

move - w, a, s, d

pick up volunteer - q

assign volunteer to room (while standing in entrance) - e
